Good game, fun to play with friends, but the devs are really trying their hardest to kill the game. Never listening to the community after putting out a new patch on the Public Test Build PTB. Killers being released buggy and almost unplayable (the twins) or having almost all of their chapters perks not function properly (the twins again). You would think that they would learn their lesson after years of this shit, but no, they continue to push buggy unfinished garbage to the live servers. Again with patch 4.5, they continue to make bad decisions about their game, (the new HUD). Anyone looking at this new HUD can tell it looks like shit and is all over the place. Why would they spread out all of the info to every corner of the screen, the new portraits don't look good either. After receiving huge community backlash over the new HUD on the PTB, what do they decide to do about it? Nothing, the answer is nothing. They push the patch to live and pretend like its a change people actually want. I've played this game since release, I thought there would be nothing the devs could do to make the experience of playing dead by daylight even more frustrating to play, but they continue to prove me wrong time and time again.

Not to mention the "Events" that get smaller and smaller every year, with most of them not even functioning properly (looking at you anniversary event where they couldn't even make the bonus points work for the majority of the event).



Behavior plz I love this game, but when you continue to prove time and time again that you just don't care about listening to the community, I can't keep playing this game

BHVR really needs to start listening to users instead of making the game worse (late example, change of interface)

Игра определенно стоит своих денег, можно конкретно залипнуть на долгие часы. Также нормальные, демократичные цены на ДЛС.

Минусы: 
1) Может попасться Discord команда сурвов. Против которой вы мало что сможете сделать, играя за убийцу.
2) Работа обновленного ореха и пробивание в палете. Играя за убийцу можно нанести удар, сурв закричит, но при этом урона вы ему не нанесете. Это довольно-таки запутывает и раздражает. 
3) Другие незначительные баги.

Если откинуть все минусы игры, то игра хороша в своем жанре. Потому что аналогов ей нет, а если и появляются, то быстро забываются и умирают.

Overall it used to be a pretty fun game, but the updates try really hard to make it unplayable. I had high hopes when nice features like crossplay became a thing... nowadays its one questionable choice after the other. An atrocious HUD redesign makes finding things on the screen a chore- information is scattered all over the place. Previously timegated cosmetics that you had to grind for were given out to all players but in its place new "limited" cosmetics were added. The old double bloodpoint events are very rare these times. And if they happen, you only get x1.5 bloodpoints. Why are the devs so stingy when it comes to giving out bloodpoints? The amount of bloodpoints you used to get cant be compared to the game right now since so much new stuff has been added. Bloodpooints are capped to 1 million for no reason. You cant even properly prepare for a new chapter with these limitations. Grinding to unlock the perks and then leveling up every character to actually play them is way to tedious/borderline a mini-job with all the new characters. The developers in itself are another thing that limits this game pretty hard. Over all the years and with all the money they got from paid dlcs Dead By Daylight still only has ONE gamemode. One of the game designers (that shall be unnamed but look it up) said on his streams that very obviously overpowered perks are no problem meanwhile we cant have colourblind mode because it would give an unfair advantage. They backpedaled on this after a big community backlash but its super obvious that they balance the game purely on their on "feelings" (some devs have very poor gamesense) or raw statistics without acknowledging whats going on in the background or whenever the community is finally tilted enough to make some noise. Balance changes for perks that desperately need it happen way to rarely. Most of the time only a few numbers get changed anyway, why do only like 5 perks get changed each patch. Im not even calling for them to shake up the meta, just please for the love of god make some shitty perks a little less shitty. The new survivor movement looks ugly. Some killers still hit you all the way from India through windows. There are no new halloween or christmas events. Loading times for survivors makes me grow a beard. But no, rather nerf pig or add a scream and an overheat bar to billy amirite gamers? As long as sheeps buy the new "content" aka skins from them this will keep on happening. At this point the game is straight up downgrading and I feel sorry for all the content creators that have to stick with this burning mess because they need to pay rent.
The only thing I really like is that each map gets a little more uniquely with new designs. Then again, maybe make some of the maps smaller so even low mobility killers stand a chance???

I'm not sure I've ever encountered a studio with such contempt for their playerbase.  How they stay afloat is mind-boggling, and probably 95% through battlepass income.

I got my time out of it, and it was fun enough - but the peak is probably past.  If you enjoy the game, good for you.  If you haven't tried it yet, I do not recommend you start playing it.

EDIT: Steam says to update my review, and I find it to be accurate as originally written.  I feel about this game like I feel about smoking.  Don't, because it's dumb and you know it's dumb.

Dear Dev team please for the love of god revert the design choices of the UI and survivor animations i have been on a few twitch streams and a few youtube videos and most of your player base hates them. The UI makes it look like a wannabe moblie game and the survivor animations make them look like a wannabe slenderman or when injured they look like a constipated forrest gump. Please listen to the majority of your player base and undo what you have done or atleast make it optional for the diehard players that love the game don't push us away for the new meat. please....

BHVR что вы сделали с игрой?
Играю с конца 2016-начало 2017 в игру не задротил,но иногда уделял ей много времени
За все это время смотрел как много раз BHVR ухудшают игру, началось с 2016 года
Испортили баланс, кто? осколки? часы? Нет!
Испортили баланс кемперы и тунелеры,тк в то время не было особо профессиональных игроков которые делали 360,все пытались сделать свою задачу выжевшего, спасти,сбежать, но от кемпера с ноедом,не сбежишь в любом случае,особенно если это был билли, потом разрабы пожалели сурвов и дали им часы,а потом осколок,ну и вот эти кемперы и тунелеры,которые ранг поднимали только своим не умением играть и отсутствием мозга жаловались на это,якобы нельзя их поймать, когда ман был кемпером и только стоял его разносили умением и командной работой,при этом еще до этого убрали 50% палет с карт и сделали ограничение на окна - 3 раза,объясняя это тем что новым убийцам сложно играть, эти отбитые долб**бы кемпили людей,потом писав в чат gg ez,а как их разносить-начали ныть.
Игру убивали постепенно, многие просто не выдержали и ушли,мне понравилась сама концепция игры,поэтому я остался в ней, мне было все равно умерла ли игра или нет,я играл ради фана и удовольствия до этого момента, мои нервы уже не выдержали такую дрoчь которую высрали BHVR,изменения всей механики игры, мне даже посрать на то что перки уже не те что раньше,,но ска за 2 года они не могут починить хиты,когда тебя ман хитует через окно когда ты уже убежал-это не нормально,да и еще перс по-другому стал двигаться,как выкатили 4.5.0,много багов связанных с препятствиями и хитами через окна в пустом месте,были такие случаи,когда я уже скинул палету но чел пробил через нее,хотя его не оглушило и он был примерно за метр от меня,это был фреди и он постоянно так хитал за 1-3 метра, когда меня снимали, чел подставился в плотную,но ударил он меня, игра умирает, зато выкатывают новые скины, чинить игру они не будут,поэтому чтобы сэкономить себе время я ухожу из неё на данный момент 10.02.2021, мб когда я вернусь через какое-то время,они починят игру

the match making is awful, toxic players, hacker issues, the game feels less and less fun as you play it... not for people who get angry easily at all, nothing works as it would or should until you run into the encounter to find out what it actually is. 

survivors are really strong and there's a bunch of ben shapiro wannabes that will die on every hill to tell you that the game is actually killer sided, just don't do x,y,z blah blah blah and eventually the argument is just saying, the game is bad and here is what you can do at this specific part to do the least bad thing but no matter what you will do as killer your choices are all bad.

soloq for survivor is a nightmare almost every time. the devs are just really lazy and don't do much, working at bhvr im pretty sure is like you clock in, make a lot of money and just goof around actually, im serious. if you want to do something then you kinda just do it? besides working on skin cosmetics. anytime any game like dbd arises, they seem to patch things quicker and release events, you can tell they are worried but its just not enough..

play some to get to know what the game is i guess and what the memes u see online mean but please save yourself and don't keep playing once you get angry at why the game is so trash, all that awaits you is hundreds more of hours finding out other bs and bugs only to accept them and know what to do instead then get bored after about 1000 hours. 

the only good thing i have to say of this game is that you will have some fun moments and the game does well supporting / promoting minorities / ethnic groups and how this game used to be wayyyyyyyy worse. its not even the same game looking back at 2016-2018. its gotten better.. i guess... its just not enough

Overall game is actually good but players still leave this game mainly cause of 2 things. First thing is bugs like pallets being dropped on killer but he still hits you and then he gets the stun or hitting someone through textures. Second thing are killers and I mean mostly the way how some of them play. You can meet in most matches a killer that after hooking you decided to camp next to you all the time or just go only after you in match and after killing you, he decided to hunt another - only one person. Killers are so annoying that even if someone is closer to the killer he will still go for you because he knows you are closer to dying. Well, it wouldn't be so annoying if the players got actually punished for this, but higher ups simply don't care about this stuff. All of this might look like I am just complaining on game, but there is a lot more people that think the same and left this game cause of those 2 things. I might be another person that left cause of this.

I can not recommend this game in the current state that it is in. The 4.50 update has completely ruined the game, terrible animations updates, lack of pallets in most new map updates leaving big empty areas of next to nothing. Not to mention the absolutely, not asked for HUD update that turns the game into what once felt not cluttered, to in your face all the time. A simple compromise to would have been to leave the old HUD as a choice and then see what most players choose. The Devs refuse to yet again listen to their player base and continue to update the game in a direction that continues to stem negativity. It's hard to ask for a positive community when this is what you get.

Update: Verison 4.70, this patch has improved the game greatly, the map update was also quite nice compared to previous ones. The player animations have improved and perk changes have been a nice balance to making games feel pretty even sided. I do wish they would fix some of the pallet balancing that is still an issue, where it's either complete deadzones (Autohaven) or way to many pallets (The Game). Overall they're going in positive direction, just please no more K-POP/Anime killers.

This game is for people who want to show off their skills. It's a very basic game, once you learn the map layouts you can plan how to go about "winning". There are tons of gate keeps that have been playing since 2016-2017. New players, less than 2000 hours love to emulate their favorite Youtubers/twitch streams, so the meta is real. survivors run one of if not more of the same 6 perks in almost every build. and killers aren't that bright so you'll usually run into the same 6 killers ever though there are 20+ to choose from. if you want to be "good" at the game. play both side. play killer to learn how survivors work, and play survivor to be a better killer. you'll get your ass beat from time to time. but don't get mad, get better.

Seit dem Update auf Version 5.0.0 wo der neue Killer Nemesis an den start ging, stürzt ausgerechnet nur das Spiel Dead by Daylight immer wieder ab. Alle anderen Spiele sind davon unberührt, also was auch immer da gemacht wurde irgendwas läuft hier schief. Ich hab den Fehlerbericht schon mehrfach jetzt an Dead by Daylight gesendet, gibt ja dafür ne nette Funktion sobald es Abstürzt. Die UI für den Zuschauer Modus ist sehr unschön, denn jetzt muss man sich merken wieviele Survivor schon angeharkt waren und wie oft früher konnte man es sehen im Zuschauer Modus. Jetzt tappt man hier leider im Dunkeln. Bitte die Alte UI für den Zuschauer Modus wieder einbauen und die Bugs fixen dann ist alles wieder Topp. ;)

No matter what they do this game will most likely never be completely balanced.
